Text: GameCubes for Eggheads and Your Amazoncom SavingsDear Eggheadcom Customer We recently emailed you a special offer to celebrate the relaunch of Eggheadcom powered by Amazoncom off your order of or more in the Amazoncom Electronics Software Computers Camera Photo and Cell Phones Service stores If you havent yet taken advantage of these savings stop by today and check out our new storethe offer expires December promo Plus as a special welcome weve reserved a limited number of Nintendo GameCube packages exclusively for purchase by visitors to Eggheadcom It will be first come first served and theyre sure to go fastso dont miss your chance to purchase the amazing new gaming system from the makers of GameBoy Advance and Nintendo The GameCubes will go on sale between pm and pm EST pm and pm PST Wednesday December See site for more details promo We hope youll visit our new store and take advantage of your in extra savings see below for promotional certificate instructions Hurry thoughthe offer expires at the end of the year and the GameCubes wont last long so stop by today promo Sincerely Eggheadcom PS Please note that no personally identifiable information regarding your Eggheadcom customer account has been disclosed to Amazoncom All Eggheadcom customer information will continue to be treated in accordance with Eggheadcoms privacy policy For more information about Amazoncom including their Privacy Notice and Conditions of Use please see the Help section of their site help We hope you enjoyed receiving this message but please note that replies will not be read If youd rather not receive emails like this in the future please click here unsubhgKfEWy Please note that unsubscribe requests take a few days to process If you recently sent a request prior to receiving this email we apologize for any inconvenience youll be removed from our mail list as soon as possible Dont delete This is your Amazoncom promotional certificate Amount off your purchase in the Amazoncom Electronics Software Computers Camera Photo and Cell Phones Service stores Claim Code EGSNKVJPRHQTYP Expires December Note This code is identical to the one included in our original email about this offer If youve already taken advantage of the offer please note this code can be used only once To redeem your promotional certificate simply Go to the Amazoncom Electronics Software Computers Camera Photo or Cell Phones Service stores Select the items you want totaling or more excluding shipping and tax and add them to your Shopping Cart Click the Proceed to checkout button sorry customers cannot redeem their promotional certificate using our Click service Youll be taken to the checkout page where you can review your order and select shipping options Enter your promotional claim code in the space provided in the right column located below your order total and click the Apply button The certificate will be redeemed and the page will refresh with your revised order total Please note that you must pay for any remaining order balance with a credit card Click the Place your order button Youre done If you want to review the details of your order again click the Your Account button in the upper right corner of the page The fine print Offer must be redeemed at egghead electronics software computers camera or cellphones toward the purchase of products sold by Amazoncom and listed in Amazoncoms online Electronics Software Computers Camera Photo or Cell Phones Service catalogs Offer cannot be redeemed at Amazoncouk Amazonde Amazonfr Amazoncojp or any other Web site operated by Amazoncom its affiliates or thirdparty merchants accessible from our site including for example our Health Beauty store operated by drugstorecom Offer not valid in Amazon Marketplace Auctions or zShops Purchase must total or more excluding shipping charges and tax in the abovenamed stores You must pay for this order with a credit card If you return items purchased with a promotional certificate you will not receive a refund for the amount of the promotional certificate Limit one offer per customer and one offer per purchase Offer not valid with other promotional certificates Offer must be applied at the time of the order and cannot be applied to orders already placed with us Offer cash value is th of one cent and is not for resale Offer may not be redeemed for cash This promotional certificate will expire at pm PST on December We would like to point out that when you redeem this offer Amazoncom recognizes you as part of a select group of Eggheadcom customers If you have any questions regarding Amazoncom please see the Help section on the Amazoncom site help
